description:
1) Go to left navigation page and tap on Clients.
 2) In clients list page, click on '+' icon.
 3) In next create client page, tap on image and then select take photo.
 4) Submit client with other mandatory fields.
5) Go to the client page, and tap on the image.
Expected: It should show both 'Take photo' and Upload Photo options.
Actual: Its only showing take photo option. Uploading existing photo is not  available.

This PR can be helpful in doing this task: https://github.com/openMF/android-client/pull/1164
name: Mifos Android Client - Bug Fix: No options to upload existing photo in Edit client page.
